DOC.brief_summary: A multicenter, multinational, prospective study to clarify, whether the addition of cryobiopsy can avoid surgical lung biopsy in a clinically relevant proportion of patients with suspected Idiopathic Interstitial Pneumonia
DOC.brief_title: Open Label Trial of Utility of Cryobiopsy in the Multidisciplinary Diagnosis of Idiopathic Interstitial Lung Disease
